fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Scatter starwind across the Town. Tonight, *all* Striked players will be redirected to *all* other Striked players. (2 night cooldown)
- Call upon stellar retribution, attacking anyone who visits any Striked player tonight. You'll attack people multiple times if they visit multiple Striked players. (2 night cooldown)
- Prepare a Strike on a player. Strikes will activate the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you would attack the same person multiple times in a night, you'll add the previous attack's tier to your current one, which may stack.
- Whenever a Thundercry member besides you dies, generate a Strike. If they're killed by you, generate two.
- If two or more Striked players are alive, gain Basic defense. If there are three or more, you may multitask.
